name: nzdpu_emissions
description: Get emissions data for a specific company. Returns Scope 1, Scope 2 (LB and MB), and Scope 3 (all 15 categories with coverage analysis). Use nzdpu_search first to get the company's nz_id. CRITICAL: Never compare Scope 2 Location-Based to Market-Based - they measure different things.

company_id.description: The company nz_id (get this from nzdpu_search first)

year.description: Specific reporting year (omit for all available years)
